body_html:
This is based on @apaszke's implementation which is based on NumPy's implementation. I reordered the ScalarType enum to match the order given in the table since I find that order more natural, but we could reorder the table as well.

Also, I'll add a test that this follows numpy's behavior in a follow-on PR.
body_text:
This is based on @apaszke's implementation which is based on NumPy's implementation.  I reordered the ScalarType enum to match the order given in the table since I find that order more natural, but we could reorder the table as well.
Also, I'll add a test that this follows numpy's behavior in a follow-on PR.
body:
This is based on @apaszke's implementation which is based on NumPy's implementation.  I reordered the ScalarType enum to match the order given in the table since I find that order more natural, but we could reorder the table as well.

Also, I'll add a test that this follows numpy's behavior in a follow-on PR.
